content:
@Vaida PlankytÄ— @Dieuwertje Bloemen as discussed, I went ahead and created a webpage for the (new!) Documentation Working Group: https://www.gdcc.io/working-groups/documentation.html

I modeled it off the Sensitive Data webpage. Here's the source I added: https://github.com/gdcc/www.gdcc.io/pull/9/files

Feedback is welcome from everyone!

thanks Phil! I've updated the Dataverse calendar event, but it's generated a new video link-- I think it's https://meet.google.com/yjm-phxw-deb (sorry, didn't realise it'd do that!). For newcomers: We meet on the third Friday of the month at 2pm UTC. :sunglasses:
@Vaida PlankytÄ— great! Do you want to make a pull request to update the link? The file to edit is https://github.com/gdcc/www.gdcc.io/blob/main/source/working-groups/documentation.md
